mapper.update: UPDATE kxmall_spu SET sales = sales + #{delta} WHERE id = #{spuId}
mapper.select: SELECT id,title FROM kxmall_spu WHERE category_id = #{categroyId}
SELECT id,title,category_id as categoryId FROM kxmall_spu ORDER BY category_id

SELECT id,title, original_price as originalPrice, price, title, sales, img, detail, description, category_id as categoryId, freight_template_id AS freightTemplateId, unit, status, gmt_update AS gmtUpdate, gmt_create AS gmtCreate FROM kxmall_spu WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id FROM kxmall_spu order by id

select a.id, a.title, a.original_price as originalPrice, a.title, a.img, a.detail, a.description, a.category_id as categoryId, a.freight_template_id AS freightTemplateId, a.unit, .status, a.gmt_update AS gmtUpdate, a.price, a.gmt_create AS gmtCreate, 0 as 'skuDto.activityId', 0 as 'skuDto.couponId' from kxmall_spu a
WHERE a.status = 1
and a.title like CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')
and a.category_id = #{categoryId}
and a.category_id in
#{list}
order by ${orderBy} asc desc

select spu.id,spu.title, spu.original_price as originalPrice, couponSku.discount_price as 'stockDto.price', spu.title, spu.img, spu.detail, spu.description, spu.category_id as categoryId, spu.freight_template_id AS freightTemplateId, spu.unit, spu.status, spu.gmt_update AS gmtUpdate, spu.gmt_create AS gmtCreate, 0 as 'stockDto.sales', couponSku.sku_id as skuId, activity.id as activityId, coupon.id as couponId from kxmall_activity activity LEFT JOIN kxmall_activity_coupon activityCoupon on activityCoupon.activity_id = activity.id LEFT JOIN kxmall_coupon coupon on coupon.id = activityCoupon.coupon_id LEFT JOIN kxmall_coupon_sku couponSku on couponSku.coupon_id = coupon.id LEFT JOIN kxmall_spu spu on spu.id = couponSku.spu_id where activity.activity_type = #{activityType} and activity.status = 1

SELECT spu.id,spu.title, spu.original_price as originalPrice, spu.price, spu.title, spu.sales, spu.img, spu.detail, spu.description, spu.category_id as categoryId, spu.freight_template_id AS freightTemplateId, spu.unit, spu.status, spu.gmt_update AS gmtUpdate, spu.gmt_create AS gmtCreate from kxmall_coupon coupon LEFT JOIN kxmall_coupon_sku couponSku on couponSku.coupon_id = coupon.id LEFT JOIN kxmall_spu spu on spu.id = couponSku.spu_id WHERE coupon.id = #{couponId} and spu.id = #{spuId}

select spu.id,spu.title, spu.original_price as originalPrice, couponSku.discount_price as 'stockDto.price', spu.title, spu.img, spu.detail, spu.description, spu.category_id as categoryId, spu.freight_template_id AS freightTemplateId, spu.unit, spu.status, spu.gmt_update AS gmtUpdate, spu.gmt_create AS gmtCreate, couponSku.limit_num-couponSku.use_num as 'stockDto.sales', couponSku.sku_id as skuId, activity.id as activityId, coupon.id as couponId from kxmall_activity activity LEFT JOIN kxmall_activity_coupon activityCoupon on activityCoupon.activity_id = activity.id LEFT JOIN kxmall_coupon coupon on coupon.id = activityCoupon.coupon_id LEFT JOIN kxmall_coupon_sku couponSku on couponSku.coupon_id = coupon.id LEFT JOIN kxmall_spu spu on spu.id = couponSku.spu_id left join kxmall_stock stock on stock.spu_id = spu.id where activity.activity_type = #{activityType} and stock.storage_id = #{storageId}
